sentence: If candidates like Kari Lake in Arizona and David Perdue in Georgia are successful, it would give them final say over whether to certify a slate of electors for a presidential candidate.” Panetta adds, “Such trends raise the risk of a disputed or possibly stolen election in the 2022 midterms.
author: Alex Henderson
title: Here’s how 'rogue' GOP governors could steal the 2024 election for Trump — and cause a 'constitutional tailspin'

sentence: In Arizona, Trump-endorsed gubernatorial candidate Kari Lake touted her "historic grassroots" fundraising.
